item.name: HA Master Quality
item.description: Give the quality of this Firewall (-1 if you can't reach the Firewall).

item.name: HA Master Status
item.description: Give the status, 1 for active, 2 for passive

item.name: HA Slave Quality
item.description: Give the quality of this Firewall (-1 if you can't reach the Firewall).

item.name: HA Slave Status
item.description: Give the status, 1 for active, 2 for passive

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP StormShield:snmptrap[WAN].regexp("Attaque possible par MSS faible")}<>0
trigger.name: Attaque possible par MSS faible
Débordement de la file de données TCP

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP StormShield:snmptrap[WAN].regexp("Niveau de chiffrement non autoris")}<>0
trigger.name: Niveau de chiffrement non autorisé

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP StormShield:snmptrap[WAN].regexp("Paquet SSL invalide Unknown SSL protocol")}<>0
trigger.name: Paquet SSL invalide (Unknown SSL protocol)
Service HTTP Proxy is not running
Service SMTP Proxy is not running

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP StormShield:UpdateStatusVulnerabilityManagement.regexp("Uptodate")}=0 or {Template SNMP StormShield:UpdateStatusAntispamDNSRBL.regexp("Uptodate")}=0 or {Template SNMP StormShield:UpdateStatusRootCertificates.regexp("Uptodate")}=0 or {Template SNMP StormShield:UpdateStatusIPS.regexp("Uptodate")}=0 or {Template SNMP StormShield:UpdateStatusAntivirus.regexp("Uptodate")}=0 or {Template SNMP StormShield:UpdateStatusAntispamHeuristic.regexp("Uptodate")}=0 or {Template SNMP StormShield:UpdateStatusGeoIP.regexp("Uptodate")}=0
trigger.name: StormShield Signatures Update problem
